name: inventory-microservices
description: Sistema de inventario con arquitectura de microservicios e IoT

scripts.install:all: npm install && npm run install:services && npm run install:frontend
scripts.install:services: concurrently "npm run install:api-gateway" "npm run install:auth" "npm run install:products" "npm run install:inventory" "npm run install:iot"
scripts.test:services: concurrently "npm run test:api-gateway" "npm run test:auth" "npm run test:products" "npm run test:inventory" "npm run test:iot"
scripts.test:contract: npm run test:contract:consumer && npm run test:contract:provider
scripts.lint: npm run lint:services && npm run lint:frontend
scripts.lint:services: concurrently "npm run lint:api-gateway" "npm run lint:auth" "npm run lint:products" "npm run lint:inventory" "npm run lint:iot"
scripts.lint:fix: npm run lint:services:fix && npm run lint:frontend:fix
scripts.lint:services:fix: concurrently "cd 2-backend/api-gateway && npm run lint:fix" "cd 2-backend/auth-service && npm run lint:fix" "cd 2-backend/product-service && npm run lint:fix" "cd 2-backend/inventory-service && npm run lint:fix" "cd 2-backend/iot-service && npm run lint:fix"
scripts.validate:api-specs: echo 'âš ï¸ API validation moved to individual services'
scripts.validate:openapi: echo 'âš ï¸ OpenAPI validation moved to individual services'
scripts.validate:examples: echo 'âš ï¸ Examples validation moved to individual services'
scripts.docs:generate: echo 'ðŸ“š Documentation is available in docs/ folder'
scripts.docs:api: echo 'ðŸ“‹ API documentation is available in each service'
scripts.db:migrate: cd 2-backend/auth-service && npm run migrate && cd ../product-service && npm run migrate && cd ../inventory-service && npm run migrate && cd ../iot-service && npm run migrate
scripts.db:seed: cd 2-backend/auth-service && npm run seed && cd ../product-service && npm run seed && cd ../inventory-service && npm run seed && cd ../iot-service && npm run seed
scripts.db:reset: npm run db:migrate && npm run db:seed

hooks.pre-push: npm run test && npm run validate:api-specs
